Ask a question to the magic 8 ball.

## Usage

```sh
/8ball
```

## Options

|    Name    |                Description               | Required |
| :--------: | :--------------------------------------: | :------: |
| `question` | The question to ask to the magic 8 ball. |    Yes   |
